title: WTT: My E98 Cobb for your T206 Cobb
author: Comiskey

posts.post_title: WTT: My E98 Cobb for your T206 Cobb
posts.post_content:
I recently purchased a E98 Green Cobb (see scan) and thought it might be better to trade it away to stay on track with my T206 set. If you have a T206 Green portrait Cobb or Bat on and want to work out a trade for my E98 Cobb let me know.

Jeff
